comment.author: 30180732@N02
comment._content: I would suggest that the label on this photograph is incorrect.  Birchy Cove, Bay of Islands is on the west coast of the island of Newfoundland, not in Labrador.

comment.author: 65691965@N00
comment._content: You're absolutely correct.   The "NL" means Newfoundland and Labrador, of course.
